forumNotes.author: westnz
forumNotes.content: I know there is tutorials to create this on a usb ([http://www.rmprepusb...to-internal-hdd](http://www.rmprepusb.com/tutorials/install-xp-and-win7-to-internal-hdd "External link")), but what about a DL DVD? Thank you.

forumNotes.author: Wonko the Sane
forumNotes.content:
Not a "one piece tutorial", but this thread should be able to put you on a "right track":  
[http://www.msfn.org/...pt-setupldrbin/](http://www.msfn.org/board/topic/156689-missing-or-corrupt-setupldrbin/ "External link")  

![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif)  
Wonko

forumNotes.author: Wonko the Sane
forumNotes.content:
> What is a DL DVD ???  
DL -\>Dual/Double Layer  
[http://en.wikipedia....g/wiki/DVD+R_DL](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DVD%2BR_DL "External link")  
What we *technicians* like to call "a perfect recipe for disaster when used as boot disc" :wink: (unless proper care is taken in the placement of key boot files).  

![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif)  
Wonko
